name: VGS Payment Acceptance Sample App
description: Use VGS to collect and protect sensitive card data and orchestrate payments to mulitple processors.

VGS_USERNAME.description: Vault Access Credentials Username. This is used to connect to the outbound route proxy.

VGS_PASSWORD.description: Vault Access Credentials Password. This is used to connect to the outbound route proxy.

STRIPE_KEY.description: Stripe secret key. This can be found in the Stripe portal.

ADYEN_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT.description: Adyen merchant account. This can be found in the Adyen portal.

ADYEN_KEY.description: Adyen secret key. This can be found in the Adyen portal.

HEARTLAND_KEY.description: Heartland secret key. This can be found in the Heartland portal.
